content: This article includes a list of references, related reading, or external links, **but its sources remain unclear because it lacks inline citations**. Please help improve this article by introducing more precise citations. *(January 2022)* *(Learn how and when to remove this message)* **Teck Ghee Single Member Constituency** was a single member constituency (SMC) in [Ang Mo Kio](/wiki/Ang_Mo_Kio), Singapore. The constituency was formed in 1984 and was abolished in 1991 ## History In 1984, the **Teck Ghee Constituency** was formed by merging parts of [Ang Mo Kio](/wiki/Ang_Mo_Kio_Constituency) and [Chong Boon constituencies](/wiki/Chong_Boon_Constituency). [Lee Hsien Loong](/wiki/Lee_Hsien_Loong) made his political debut in this constituency when it was formed. In 1988, it was renamed as **Teck Ghee Single Member Constituency** as part of Singapore's political reforms. In 1991, it was abolished and merged into [Ang Mo Kio Group Representation Constituency](/wiki/Ang_Mo_Kio_Group_Representation_Constituency). ## Member of Parliament YearMember of ParliamentParty**1984**[Lee Hsien Loong](/wiki/Lee_Hsien_Loong)[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)**1988** ## Electoral results Note: The [Elections Department](/wiki/Elections_Department_Singapore) does not include rejected votes when calculating the vote shares of candidates. Hence, all candidates' vote shares will total to 100% at any given election (may not appear so in multi-way contests due to rounding). ### Elections in 1980s [General Election 1984](/wiki/1984_Singaporean_general_election): Teck Ghee PartyCandidateVotes%±%[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)[Lee Hsien Loong](/wiki/Lee_Hsien_Loong)12,79480.38United People's FrontGiam Lai Cheng3,12319.62[Majority](/wiki/Majority#Related_terms)9,67160.76[Turnout](/wiki/Voter_turnout)16,40497.3[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party) **win** (new seat)[General Election 1988](/wiki/1988_Singaporean_general_election): Teck Ghee PartyCandidateVotes%±%[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)[Lee Hsien Loong](/wiki/Lee_Hsien_Loong)11,51279.13−1.25[Independent](/wiki/Independent_(politician))Patrick Leong3,03720.87+20.87[Majority](/wiki/Majority#Related_terms)8,47558.26−2.5[Turnout](/wiki/Voter_turnout)14,95296.4−0.9[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party) **hold**[Swing](/wiki/Swing_(politics))-1.25 - 1988 General Election's result - 1984 General Election's result This [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore) location article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Teck Ghee Single Member Constituency
